5 Ways to Disable Popup Blockers - wikiHow

 Reader Approved How to Disable Popup Blockers   
 This wikiHow teaches you how to change the settings in Google Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, Microsoft Edge, Internet Explorer, and Safari to allow pop-up ads and dialog boxes as you browse the Web. 
 Steps Edit 
 Method One of Five: Google Chrome Edit 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/c\/cb\/Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-1-Version-4.jpg\/v4-460px-Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-1-Version-4.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/c\/cb\/Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-1-Version-4.jpg\/v4-760px-Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-1-Version-4.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 1 
 Open Google Chrome. 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/3\/30\/Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-2-Version-4.jpg\/v4-460px-Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-2-Version-4.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/3\/30\/Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-2-Version-4.jpg\/v4-760px-Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-2-Version-4.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 2 
 Click  ⋮  in the upper-right corner of the window. 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/c\/cb\/Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-3-Version-4.jpg\/v4-460px-Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-3-Version-4.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/c\/cb\/Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-3-Version-4.jpg\/v4-760px-Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-3-Version-4.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 3 
 Click  Settings . 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/f\/f2\/Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-4-Version-3.jpg\/v4-460px-Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-4-Version-3.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/f\/f2\/Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-4-Version-3.jpg\/v4-760px-Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-4-Version-3.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 4 
 Scroll to the bottom of the page and click  Advanced . 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/4\/48\/Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-5-Version-3.jpg\/v4-460px-Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-5-Version-3.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/4\/48\/Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-5-Version-3.jpg\/v4-760px-Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-5-Version-3.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 5 
 Scroll down and click  Content settings .  It's near the bottom of the "Privacy and security" section.
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/f\/f0\/Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-6-Version-3.jpg\/v4-460px-Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-6-Version-3.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/f\/f0\/Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-6-Version-3.jpg\/v4-760px-Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-6-Version-3.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 6 
 Scroll down and click  Popups . 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/9\/96\/Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-7-Version-3.jpg\/v4-460px-Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-7-Version-3.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/9\/96\/Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-7-Version-3.jpg\/v4-760px-Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-7-Version-3.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 7 
 Slide the  Blocked  slider to the "On" position
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/d\/df\/Android7systemswitchon2.png","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/d\/df\/Android7systemswitchon2.png","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
.  You will now see pop-up windows whenever you encounter them in Chrome.
 You can block pop-ups from individual sites by clicking  Add  under the "Blocked" section of the menu and entering the URL of the site from which you wish to block the content. 
 Advertisement 
 Method Two of Five: Mozilla Firefox Edit 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/c\/cf\/Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-8-Version-3.jpg\/v4-460px-Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-8-Version-3.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/c\/cf\/Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-8-Version-3.jpg\/v4-760px-Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-8-Version-3.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 1 
 Open Mozilla Firefox. 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/5\/5c\/Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-9-Version-3.jpg\/v4-460px-Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-9-Version-3.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/5\/5c\/Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-9-Version-3.jpg\/v4-760px-Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-9-Version-3.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 2 
 Click  ☰  in the upper-right corner of the window. 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/4\/4f\/Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-10-Version-3.jpg\/v4-460px-Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-10-Version-3.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/4\/4f\/Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-10-Version-3.jpg\/v4-760px-Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-10-Version-3.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 3 
 Click
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/6\/68\/Android7settings.png","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/6\/68\/Android7settings.png","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":460,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":760} 
Preferences. 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/a\/a4\/Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-11-Version-3.jpg\/v4-460px-Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-11-Version-3.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/a\/a4\/Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-11-Version-3.jpg\/v4-760px-Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-11-Version-3.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 4 
 Click  Content  in the left pane of the window. 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/4\/48\/Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-12-Version-3.jpg\/v4-460px-Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-12-Version-3.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/4\/48\/Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-12-Version-3.jpg\/v4-760px-Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-12-Version-3.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 5 
 Uncheck  "Block pop-up windows. "  You will now see pop-up windows whenever you encounter them in Firefox.
 If you have blocking on, you can allow pop-ups from individual sites by clicking  Exceptions...  to the right of the checkbox. Enter the URL of the site from which you wish to see the content, click  Allow  and then  Save Changes . 
 Advertisement 
 Method Three of Five: Microsoft Edge Edit 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/3\/39\/Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-18-Version-3.jpg\/v4-460px-Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-18-Version-3.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/3\/39\/Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-18-Version-3.jpg\/v4-760px-Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-18-Version-3.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 1 
 Open Edge. 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/d\/d7\/Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-19-Version-3.jpg\/v4-460px-Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-19-Version-3.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/d\/d7\/Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-19-Version-3.jpg\/v4-760px-Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-19-Version-3.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 2 
 Click  …  in the upper-right part of the screen. 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/a\/a1\/Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-20-Version-3.jpg\/v4-460px-Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-20-Version-3.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/a\/a1\/Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-20-Version-3.jpg\/v4-760px-Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-20-Version-3.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 3 
 Click  Settings . 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/5\/53\/Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-21-Version-3.jpg\/v4-460px-Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-21-Version-3.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/5\/53\/Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-21-Version-3.jpg\/v4-760px-Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-21-Version-3.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 4 
 Scroll down and click  View advanced settings . 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/c\/cf\/Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-22-Version-3.jpg\/v4-460px-Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-22-Version-3.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/c\/cf\/Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-22-Version-3.jpg\/v4-760px-Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-22-Version-3.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 5 
 Slide "Block pop-ups" to the "Off" position
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/2\/25\/Iphoneswitchofficon.png","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/2\/25\/Iphoneswitchofficon.png","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":293.6170212766,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":485.10638297872} 
.  You will now see pop-up windows whenever you encounter them in Edge.
 Advertisement 
 Method Four of Five: Microsoft Internet Explorer Edit 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/a\/a7\/Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-23-Version-3.jpg\/v4-460px-Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-23-Version-3.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/a\/a7\/Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-23-Version-3.jpg\/v4-760px-Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-23-Version-3.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 1 
 Open Internet Explorer. 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/7\/79\/Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-24.jpg\/v4-460px-Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-24.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/7\/79\/Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-24.jpg\/v4-760px-Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-24.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 2 
 Click
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/6\/68\/Android7settings.png","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/6\/68\/Android7settings.png","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":460,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":760} 
Tools. 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/2\/26\/Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-25.jpg\/v4-460px-Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-25.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/2\/26\/Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-25.jpg\/v4-760px-Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-25.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 3 
 Click  Internet options . 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/0\/07\/Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-26.jpg\/v4-460px-Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-26.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/0\/07\/Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-26.jpg\/v4-760px-Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-26.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 4 
 Click the  Privacy  tab. 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/b\/ba\/Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-27.jpg\/v4-460px-Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-27.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/b\/ba\/Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-27.jpg\/v4-760px-Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-27.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 5 
 Uncheck Turn on Pop-up Blocker. 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/c\/cc\/Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-28.jpg\/v4-460px-Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-28.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/c\/cc\/Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-28.jpg\/v4-760px-Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-28.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 6 
 Click  OK .  You will now see pop-up windows whenever you encounter them in Internet Explorer.
 If you have pop-up blocker  on , you can allow pop-ups from individual sites instead, as exceptions. To do this, click  Settings  next to the checkbox and enter the URL of the site from which you want to see the content. Then click  Add  and  Close . 
 Advertisement 
 Method Five of Five: Safari Edit 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/9\/9e\/Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-13-Version-3.jpg\/v4-460px-Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-13-Version-3.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/9\/9e\/Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-13-Version-3.jpg\/v4-760px-Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-13-Version-3.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 1 
 Open Safari. 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/6\/69\/Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-14-Version-3.jpg\/v4-460px-Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-14-Version-3.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/6\/69\/Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-14-Version-3.jpg\/v4-760px-Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-14-Version-3.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 2 
 Click  Safari  in the menu bar. 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/7\/7c\/Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-15-Version-3.jpg\/v4-460px-Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-15-Version-3.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/7\/7c\/Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-15-Version-3.jpg\/v4-760px-Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-15-Version-3.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 3 
 Click  Preferences… . 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/1\/1b\/Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-16-Version-2.jpg\/v4-460px-Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-16-Version-2.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/1\/1b\/Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-16-Version-2.jpg\/v4-760px-Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-16-Version-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 4 
 Click on the  Security  tab. 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/f\/f7\/Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-17-Version-3.jpg\/v4-460px-Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-17-Version-3.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/f\/f7\/Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-17-Version-3.jpg\/v4-760px-Disable-Popup-Blockers-Step-17-Version-3.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 5 
 Uncheck "Block pop-up windows" in the "Web content" section.  You will now see pop-up windows whenever you encounter them in Safari.
 You can't block pop-ups from individual sites in Safari. 
 Advertisement 
 Community Q&A 
 Search 
 Add New Question 
 How can I disable pop-ups on Chrome? 
								Answered by  
								wikiHow Contributor							 
 Download the "Adblock" extension. 
 Thanks! 
 23 
 8 
 How can I disable popups on the Safari browser? 
								Answered by  
								wikiHow Contributor							 
 1.	Open a Safari browser and click on the Safari drop-down menu.
2.	From the dropdown menu, select "Preferences."
3.	Once in Preferences, go to the Security tab.
4.	Uncheck the option "Block pop-up windows" to disable the functionality.
5.	You cannot manage exceptions in Safari. You either block all websites from displaying popups or none at all. 
 Thanks! 
 15 
 9 
 How do I enable popups on an Android tablet? 
								Answered by  
								wikiHow Contributor							 
 Select the "apps" button from the home screen on Android. Click on "Browser" to open the standard Android browser. Hit the menu button after the browser opens. Then, select "Settings" when the menu appears.Select "Advanced" from the Settings menu. Click the box labelled "Block pop-ups." 
 Thanks! 
 7 
 3 
 How do I disable popups for the Amazon silk tablet? 
								Answered by  
								wikiHow Contributor							 
 Open the Quick Settings menu. Tap on More. Go to Applications > Amazon Applications. Tap on Silk. Tap on Block Pop-up Windows and select Always.   
 Thanks! 
 13 
 8 
 How do I disable popup blocker in Windows 10 with no tools menu? 
								Answered by  
								wikiHow Contributor							 
 To disable pop-up blocker in Internet Explorer: Click the Internet Explorer icon on the desktop to open the program. Click the Tools button in the toolbar at the top of the browser window. Select Internet Options from the Tools menu. Click the Privacy tab in the Internet Options pop-up window. 
 Thanks! 
 8 
 7 
 How can I turn off the pop-up blocker on a Lenovo tablet? 
								Answered by  
								wikiHow Contributor							 
 Go in the app drawer and start the web browser. Tap the menu button, then tap settings. Tap on 
"Advanced." Scroll down to find "block pop-ups." Tap on it.  
 Thanks! 
 5 
 4 
 How do I turn off the pop up blocker on Microsoft Edge? 
								Answered by  
								wikiHow Contributor							 
 Open Edge. Click … in the upper-right part of the screen. Click Settings. Scroll down and click View Advanced Settings. Slide "Block pop-ups" to the "off" position. 
 Thanks! 
 2 
 2 
 How do I disable popups on an Android tablet? 
								Answered by  
								wikiHow Contributor							 
 Open the Browser or Internet App. This will open the stock internet browser for your Android device. Tap the "⋮" or "More" button. You'll find this in the upper-right corner. Tap "Settings." Tap "Advanced."
Slide the "Block pop-ups" button to the "on" position. 
 Thanks! 
 2 
 8 
 How can I disable popups from my iPad? 
								Answered by  
								wikiHow Contributor							 
 Go to Settings, select Safari and uncheck Block Popups.   
 Thanks!

 Video Edit 
 Tips Edit 
 Turn off any popup blocker software you may have downloaded or purchased. Blocking software (popular for weeding out adware or malware) can supersede your browser's blocking functions. Check if any software you own is keeping you from viewing popups.
